titleInfo.title: Property of Hicky, Duncan, Mather, and Conrad, 1853

subject.topic: Duncan, Abner L. H., d. ca. 1846

mods.abstract: Hicky properties shaded in red; Duncan's in green; Mather's in yellow; and Conrad's in blue. Oriented north. Bounded on the west by Front Street and the Mississippi River; on the south by Convention Street; on the east by 15th Street; and on the north by Florida Street. Scale not given.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

mods.identifier: 3592ra104f02i03_Property of Hicky Duncan Mather and Conrad 1853
